questions.question_text: Sarvādhār je ākāsh chhe te ākāshne Brahma kahīe, _____ kahīe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut Ga.Pa.46 states: Sarvādhār je ākāsh chhe te ākāshne Brahma kahīe, Chidākāsh kahīe.

questions.question_text: Ane je Aksharbrahma chhe te to e Bhagwānne rahevānu _____ chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vachanamrut Pa.1: Ane je Aksharbrahma chhe te to e Bhagwānne rahevānu dhām chhe.

questions.question_text: E Akshar bīje rūpe karīne Purushottam Nārāyaņnī _____ rahe chhe.
questions.explanation: Vachanamrut Ga.Pa.21 says: E Akshar bīje rūpe karīne Purushottam Nārāyaņnī sevāmā rahe chhe.

questions.question_text: “Hu to chiranjīvī chhu ne tamārā badhānā deh pānch-das varasmā padī jāshe.” Aa vākhya kyānu chhe?
questions.explanation: The quote 'Hu to chiranjīvī chhu ne tamārā badhānā deh pānch-das varasmā padī jāshe' is from Swa.Vato.5/67.

questions.question_text: Bhagwān jīvnā _____ arthe jyāre mūrti dhāran kare chhe tyāre potānu je Akshardhām ane Chaitanyamūrti evā je pārshad ane potānā je sarve aishvarya te sahit ja padhāre chhe.
questions.explanation: Vachanamrut Ga.Pa.71 states: Bhagwān jīvnā kalyāņne arthe jyāre mūrti dhāran kare chhe tyāre potānu je Akshardhām ane Chaitanyamūrti evā je pārshad ane potānā je sarve aishvarya te sahit ja padhāre chhe.
